name: Dickle Rick Pickle Scientist Dildo
description: Introducing Dickle Rick, the wildest pickle scientist dildo in the multiverse! Crafted with premium, body-safe silicone, this 7-inch masterpiece features a vibrant green hue, textured ridges for extra stimulation, and a sturdy suction cup base for hands-free adventures. Perfect for fans of interdimensional fun, Dickle Rick is phthalate-free, easy to clean, and compatible with water-based lubricants. Get ready to explore new dimensions of pleasure!

details.care: Clean with mild soap and water, store in a cool, dry place
